comment.author: 34286881@N00
comment._content: I regret their response to the Soviet system was not their finest work.

comment.author: 10040272@N04
comment._content: Or 'Sonny and Cher'...this is what Social Policy students in the late 1960s/early 1970s nicknamed the portraits of Sidney and Beatrice Webb that used to hang in the Social Policy Common Room in the East Building (source: LSE Alumnus Ronald Wright).
